text: @SupraDarky I'm not much of a puzzle person myself either, but i'll tell you what these puzzles have you on your toes. They might be frustrating but there aren't really many "Oh thats bs" moments, but  just taking a moment to think about them they are easy enough to figure out, and a lot of the bosses are pretty..err...creepy I suppose is a good word, but you'll get why if you play the game. The story itself is absolutely amazing, one of the best ive seen. And the music is great without saying

author: Marijn Smid

text:
@SupraDarky It's an "adult drama".  The main character is being pestered by his girlfriend to settle down and marry, and one night gets caught up with a bombshell girl who's -not- his girlfriend, and shit starts going down; on top of that, he gets caught in nightmares which could kill him if he fails to escape.

It's... definitely something unique!
